name: Scraster Professional Screencasting
tag_list: screencast, scrast, screencasting, scrasting, screencaster, scraster, software-demo, software-tutorial, custom-screencasting, video-production, screencast-production, screencast-producer
overview:
Scraster Professional Screencasting produces high-quality screencast video tutorials and demos. Established in early 2008, Scraster remains one of very few dedicated screencast production houses. Most of Scraster’s clients are small-to-midsize software firms looking to extend their marketing reach with slick demonstrations of their products or services. A number of other clients appreciate what Scraster’s tutorial vids do to minimize support calls for FAQs.

Scraster recently turned its attention to the production of iPhone app demo videos and is the only professional screencast production service advertising videos produced in an ideal simulation of the iPhone environment. The Scraster team has managed to work out all the kinks that plague amateur producers struggling with the SDK’s simulator and the popular-but-janky SimFinger toolkit. Wanna see what customers are saying about Scraster? Read some of our LinkedIn recommendations here: http://scraster.com/clients

Here are some work examples: Invoice2go iPhone app demo: http://scraster.com/invoice2go facebook news feed and wall settings from The Facebook Insider: http://bit.ly/4BypKw Valgen entry video for DreamForce 2009: http://scraster.com/valgen/
